original: intros a l2 l1 x H1 H2. unfold is_pseries in H1, H2. unfold is_series in H1, H2. rewrite is_pseries_R in H1, H2. rewrite is_pseries_R. unfold PSeries in H1, H2. rewrite PSeries_eq in H1, H2. apply is_pseries_mult in H1; auto. apply is_pseries_mult in H2; auto. apply is_pseries_plus; auto.
